entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
